# AppiumSoftAssert.AreEqual Method (String, String, String, String)
 

Soft assert method to check if the files are equal

## Syntax

**C#**<br />
``` C#
public override bool AreEqual(
	string expectedText,
	string actualText,
	string softAssertName,
	string message = ""
)
```
